name: Discworld
description:
Discworld is an adventure game developed by Teeny Weeny Games, Perfect Entertainment and Perfect 10 Productions. It came out on 01-01-1995. It was published by Psygnosis. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Discworld on PlayStation, SEGA Saturn, Classic Macintosh and PC.
It was produced by Angela Sutherland. It was directed by Gregg Barnett. It was scored by Mark Bandola and Rob Lord.
